name: node-red
description: Node-RED is a flow-based programming tool used for wiring IoT devices and APIs together visually. It offers a browser editor and can be deployed self-hosted to automate workflows, events, and integrations.
features: Flow-based programming: Wire together devices, APIs, and services using a visual drag-and-drop editor.
Browser-based editor: Design and deploy flows from any device with a web browser.
Node library: Access thousands of pre-built nodes for protocols, platforms, and services.
IoT integration: Connect to MQTT, HTTP, WebSockets, and hardware devices for automation.
Function nodes: Write custom JavaScript code within flows for complex logic and transformations.
Dashboard creation: Build web-based dashboards with charts, gauges, and controls for monitoring.
Message routing: Process and route data between nodes with filtering, splitting, and joining.
Scheduling: Trigger flows on schedules, intervals, or in response to external events.
Context storage: Persist data across flow executions with flow, global, or node-level context.
Debugging tools: Monitor message flow, inspect data, and troubleshoot with built-in debug nodes.
Import/export: Share flows as JSON for version control, backup, or community sharing.
Extensible: Create custom nodes or install community contributions for specialized functionality.
